name: Gravitee Wars
summary: Battle for control of the galaxy in this space based artillery game based on the Gravitee series of games. Slingshot your missiles around planets to destroy your enemy and utilize the 10 different weapons and utilities available. As you progress you’ll earn up to 50 different awards, and 21 different rewards. Upgrade your team as you earn money by improving your unit’s health and accuracy or by buying extra units for your team.
